category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: RDV_partnumber_validation_rule
preference.preference_description: Specifies a single-value property that determines if a design solution has a valid part number. A naming rule has to be created in Business Modeler IDE and the pattern specified for this naming rule determines what is a valid part number. The name of this naming rule must be set in this preference. Valid Values: Accepts a string as a value. This string represents the name of the naming rule.
